  • Cooked rice - 160 gms
  • Stir Fried tofu - 250 grams - cubed
  • Red bell pepper - 1/2 sliced
  • Yellow bell pepper - 1/2 sliced
  • Beans - 15 - 1 inch long cut
  • Carrot - Chopped - 1
  • Snow peas - 15 - chopped
  • Green onions - 3 - finely chopped
  • Broccoli - 6 florets
  • Cabbage - 1 cup - shredded
  • Schezwan sauce - 2 Tb sp
  • Soya sauce - 1 Tb sp
  • Vinegar - 1 Tb sp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Black Pepper Powder - 1 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Red chilly sauce - 1 Tb sp
  • Red paprika - 1 tsp
  • Basil leaves - 5 - chopped
  • Sesame oil - 1 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • On a medium heated wok, add in sesame oil
  • Add carrot, bell peppers, beans and sautÃ© 5 minutes
  • Next goes in broccoli, cabbage and snow peas
  • Saute more 5 minutes and add stir fried tofu. Combine well
  • Then add cooked rice along with salt, pepper, red Paprika, red chilly powder, schezwan sauce, red chilly sauce, vinegar, soya sauce. Mix everything well
  • Keep stirring or tossing wok over high heat for 5 minutes
  • Turn off heat and add basil leaves and green onions
